subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: After escorting American Pharoah on a whirlwind journey that ended with a Triple Crown, Bob Baffert’s assistants Jimmy and Dana Barnes are perhaps closest to the colt.
snippet: After escorting American Pharoah on a whirlwind journey that ended with a Triple Crown, Bob Baffert’s assistants Jimmy and Dana Barnes are perhaps closest to the colt.
